tha-ap379:0.3_0: As a result, he was glowd and raped by senior monks.
tha-ap379:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap379:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap379:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap379:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūmajaka.
tha-ap379:7.1_0: a quail, with senior monks who had gone forth.
